data.comment: Today's referee, Antonio Mateu Lahoz, has blown to start the match.
Bilbao have a goal kick.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Bilbao in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Antonio Mateu Lahoz signals a Bilbao throw-in in Granada's half.
In the minute 4, Ball goes out of play for a Granada goal kick.
Bilbao are coming forward and Jon Morcillo gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Antonio Mateu Lahoz awards Granada a goal kick.
In the minute 6, Granada are caught offside.
Granada needs to be cautious. Bilbao have an attacking throw-in.
Ball safe as Granada is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 8, Granada to take a throw-in in Bilbao territory.
Throw-in for Granada close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Bilbao at Estadio Nuevo Los Carmenes.
In the minute 10, Free kick for Bilbao in their own half.
At Estadio Nuevo Los Carmenes, Yangel Herrera has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Throw-in high up the field for Bilbao in Granada.
In the minute 12, It's a goal kick for the home team in Granada.
Throw-in Bilbao.
Antonio Mateu Lahoz awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 15, Granada awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jon Morcillo (Bilbao) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Antonio Mateu Lahoz signals a free kick to Granada.
In the minute 16, Darwin Machis of Granada gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Bilbao at Estadio Nuevo Los Carmenes.
Granada have a goal kick.
In the minute 18, Antonio Mateu Lahoz signals a free kick to Bilbao in their own half.
In Granada Bilbao attack through Raul Garcia. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Granada.
In the minute 21, Bilbao awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Bilbao get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Granada's half?
Throw-in for Granada in the half of Bilbao.
In the minute 23, Bilbao have a dangerous throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Bilbao.
In the minute 25, Granada awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Bilbao capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Granada's half?
Antonio Mateu Lahoz signals a throw-in for Bilbao, close to Granada's area.
In the minute 28, Throw-in for Bilbao at Estadio Nuevo Los Carmenes.
Bilbao awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Granada goal kick.
In the minute 34, Throw-in for Bilbao in the half of Granada.
Throw-in Granada.
Ball safe as Granada is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 37, Throw-in for Granada in their own half.
Antonio Mateu Lahoz signals a Bilbao throw-in in Granada's half.
Bilbao to take a throw-in in Granada territory.
In the minute 41, Free kick for Granada in their own half.
Free kick for Granada in the half of Bilbao.
Can Granada get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bilbao's half?
In the minute 44, Antonio Mateu Lahoz signals a throw-in for Granada, close to Bilbao's area.
Granada have been awarded a corner by Antonio Mateu Lahoz.
In the minute 45, Antonio Mateu Lahoz signals a free kick to Bilbao in their own half.
The 1st half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Bilbao's Raul Garcia misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 45, Antonio Mateu Lahoz awards Granada a goal kick.
In Granada a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Bilbao in the half of Granada.
In the minute 45, Antonio Mateu Lahoz blows to end the first-half.
Granada's German Sanchez has been booked in Granada.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Goal kick for Granada at Estadio Nuevo Los Carmenes.
In the minute 48, Antonio Mateu Lahoz awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Granada in their own half.
Granada awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 49, Bilbao needs to be cautious. Granada have an attacking throw-in.
Goal! Yangel Herrera heads Granada into a 1-0 lead.
Angel Montoro with an assist there.
In the minute 51, Free kick Granada.
Inigo Martinez (Bilbao) has received a yellow card from Antonio Mateu Lahoz.
Granada take a comfortable 2-0 lead thanks to Luis Milla.
In the minute 56, Corner awarded to Bilbao.
Antonio Mateu Lahoz signals a free kick to Granada in their own half.
Gaizka Garitano (Bilbao) is making a first substitution, with Unai Lopez replacing Mikel Vesga.
In the minute 56, Inaki Williams is replacing Ander Capa for the away team.
Bilbao to take a throw-in in Granada territory.
Free kick Bilbao.
In the minute 61, Oscar De Marcos gets his shot on target but fails to score for Bilbao.
Free kick for Bilbao in their own half.
Maxime Gonalons is on a sub for Angel Montoro for Granada.
Antonio Mateu Lahoz awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 63, Granada make their second substitution with Fede Vico replacing Darwin Machis.
Antonio Mateu Lahoz signals a Bilbao throw-in in Granada's half.
In the minute 66, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Bilbao drives forward and Iker Muniain gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
At Estadio Nuevo Los Carmenes, Granada are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 67, Free kick for Bilbao in the half of Granada.
Can Bilbao get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Granada's half?
Throw-in for Bilbao in the half of Granada.
In the minute 71, Can Bilbao capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Granada's half?
Bilbao surge into the attack at Estadio Nuevo Los Carmenes but Inaki Williamsâ€™s header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Granada goal kick.
In the minute 72, Antonio Mateu Lahoz signals a free kick to Granada.
Unai Lopez for Bilbao has been booked by Antonio Mateu Lahoz and receives a first yellow card.
Granada push upfield but Antonio Mateu Lahoz quickly pulls them for offside.
The away team have replaced Iker Muniain with Oihan Sancet. This is the third substitution made today by Gaizka Garitano.
In the minute 73, Asier Villalibre is replacing Raul Garcia for Bilbao at Estadio Nuevo Los Carmenes.
Great shot from Bilbao's Inaki Williams but he is denied by the crossbar.
In the minute 75, Granada awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Granada advance rapidly upfield but Antonio Mateu Lahoz blows for offside.
Diego Martinez is making the team's third substitution at Estadio Nuevo Los Carmenes with Robert Kenedy replacing Yangel Herrera.
In the minute 80, The home team replace Roberto Soldado with Ramon Azeez.
Bilbao make their fifth substitution with Unai Vencedor replacing Dani Garcia.
Bilbao to take a throw-in in Granada territory.
In the minute 83, Ball safe as Granada is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Granada.
Yeray Alvarez (Bilbao) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 85, Throw-in for Bilbao at Estadio Nuevo Los Carmenes.
Maxime Gonalons has recovered and rejoins the match in Granada.
In the minute 85, Throw-in Bilbao.
The match at Estadio Nuevo Los Carmenes has been interrupted briefly for a check on Maxime Gonalons, who is down injured.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Bilbao awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 87, Ball safe as Granada is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Antonio Mateu Lahoz signals a Granada throw-in in Bilbao's half.
Bilbao have a goal kick.
Antonio Mateu Lahoz signals a free kick to Granada in their own half.
In the minute 89, Victor Diaz is on a sub for Luis Milla for Granada.
Can Granada get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bilbao's half?
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
The fourth official's board shows 6 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Bilbao are pushing forward but Inaki Williams's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Granada.
In Granada a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Can Bilbao get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Granada's half?
Goal kick for Granada at Estadio Nuevo Los Carmenes.
Throw-in high up the field for Bilbao in Granada.
Goal kick for Granada at Estadio Nuevo Los Carmenes.
Antonio Mateu Lahoz blows to end the match. The final score is 2-0.
At Estadio Nuevo Los Carmenes, Maxime Gonalons has been yellow-carded for the home team.
